message:
What is the best hosting for personal use?
From where to buy a domain is it better to buy it from the same hosting or from another service like name.com or other?

I am looking for personal hosting to host a personal blog for me to write technical articles or anything it might interest me, Thanks in advance.

data.message: T1hosting has one year PHP hosting with WordPress and other install scripts for ~10$/year. I have a copoun for it as far as I remember. Send me a message if you're interested will search it for you.
